# calcite-pick-list-group

The `calcite-pick-list-group` is a distinct grouping of `calcite-pick-list-items` that can have their own title.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                  | Type     | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `textGroupTitle` | `text-group-title` | The title used for all nested pick-list rows | `string` | `undefined` |
